snippet.title: Pet Grooming Studio Game
snippet.description:
Even pets like to feel nice and clean. But they can’t hold a sponge or toothbrush, so they need your help!
To use the sponge, showerhead, towel, blowdryer, brush, and toothrush: click and hold the mouse, then move it quickly back and forth over the pet. To use the claw clippers, click over each claw. In Free Mode, you can also accessorize your pet and take pictures of him when he’s done!
http://b6games.com/pet-grooming-studio.html
